#### Description

Save big with the Course Helmet Bundle Deal! At this price you receive a Course Raider Evo Full Face Helmet with a Clear Visor + Snell E-2 bluetooth intercom + an extra tinted pinlock ready visor of your choice (select from the 5 different colour options)

Meticulously crafted to cater to the needs of both the seasoned enthusiast and the casual rider. This helmet has a sporty aesthetic with an integrated rear spoiler, and on the inside, you'll find all the essential features you look for in a serious on-road helmet.

A ride in well-ventilated comfort thanks to the strategically positioned air vents in the helmet, providing optimal airflow during your journey. Adapt effortlessly to changing light conditions with the convenient internal sun visor. Stay connected on the move will also be a breeze with the Snell E-2 Intercom.

Helmet Features:

â¢ **Clear visor included**

â¢ Thermoplastic outer shell

â¢ Pinlock 70 prepared visor **(Pinlock lens not included)**

â¢ Internal sun visor

â¢ Integrated rear spoiler

â¢ Micrometric closure system

â¢ Intercom ready

â¢ Five strategically positioned air vents

â¢ Replaceable inner lining

â¢ Weight: 1700 +- 50g

â¢ Complies with ECE 22.06 standards

Visor Features:

â¢ Pinlock 70 prepared visor **(Pinlock lens not included)**

â¢ 6 colour variations

Intercom Features:

â¢ 15h working time / 480h standby

â¢ 4 riders intercom with up to 1000m distance

â¢ Bluetooth 5.0

â¢ Music sharing

â¢ Voice commands

â¢ Built-in FM radio

â¢ EQ adjustment

â¢ Ambient sound

â¢ Can be connected to other brands of intercom

â¢ IP67 dustproof/waterproof

â¢ 1000 mAh battery

â¢ USB-C charge port, can be charged while using

#### Shipping & returns

### Shipping & returns

### All taxes & duties included

The price you see is the price you pay and no additional costs will be added to your order. Shop how much you want without worrying about expensive taxes, duties and slow import processes.

### Lowest Price Guarantee

We strive to maintain the best prices, if you still would find a better price from a competitor, we will match that price. Our price guarantee applies within 14 days after your purchase.

### Free shipping over Â£50\*

Orders over Â£50 are qualified for free shipping. \*This does not include bulky products nor Express delivery.

### 60-day return policy\*

You have the right to return your order within 60 days. Return fees apply. \*The right to return does not apply for products that are personalised or manufactured upon order. See our [Customer Care Section](https://help.xlmoto.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360013804060-Which-products-cannot-be-cancelled-or-returned-) for more details and conditions.

#### About the brand

Course is all about MC clothing and protection. A vast inventory of waterproof and all-season gears that includes styles and models to suit all riding types, from leather suits, custom style jackets, jeans to helmets, gloves and boots.
